1: וַיְהִ֗י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> אַחֲרֵי֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it came to pass after</n> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <sup>1697 </sup> <n>these things</n> הָאֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>that [one] told</n> לְיוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph</n> הִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אָבִ֖יךָ <sup>1 </sup> <n>Behold thy father</n> חֹלֶ֑ה <sup>2470 </sup> <n>[is] sick</n> וַיִּקַּ֞ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and he took</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁנֵ֤י <sup>8147 </sup> <n>with him his two</n> בָנָיו֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> עִמּ֔וֹ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>Manasseh</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>669 </sup> <n>and Ephraim</n>
2: וַיַּגֵּ֣ד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>And [one] told</n> לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> הִנֵּ֛ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> בִּנְךָ֥ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Behold thy son</n> יוֹסֵ֖ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph</n> בָּ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh</n> אֵלֶ֑יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וַיִּתְחַזֵּק֙ <sup>2388 </sup> <n>strengthened</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>unto thee and Israel</n> וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>himself and sat</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הַמִּטָּֽה׃ <sup>4296 </sup> <n>upon the bed</n>
3: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יַעֲקֹב֙ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>And Jacob</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>unto Joseph</n> אֵ֥ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>God</n> שַׁדַּ֛י <sup>7706 </sup> <n>Almighty</n> נִרְאָֽה־ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>appeared</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> בְּל֖וּז <sup>3870 </sup> <n>unto me at Luz</n> בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> כְּנָ֑עַן <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> וַיְבָ֖רֶךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and blessed</n> אֹתִֽי׃ <sup>853 </sup>
4: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And said</n> אֵלַ֗י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הִנְנִ֤י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> מַפְרְךָ֙ <sup>6509 </sup> <n>unto me Behold I will make thee fruitful</n> וְהִרְבִּיתִ֔ךָ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>and multiply</n> וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thee and I will make</n> לִקְהַ֣ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>of thee a multitude</n> עַמִּ֑ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of people</n> וְנָ֨תַתִּ֜י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and will give</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֧רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>this land</n> הַזֹּ֛את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>to thy seed</n> אַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after thee</n> אֲחֻזַּ֥ת <sup>272 </sup> <n>possession</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[for] an everlasting</n>
5: וְעַתָּ֡ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> שְׁנֵֽי־ <sup>8147 </sup> <n>And now thy two</n> בָנֶיךָ֩ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> הַנּוֹלָדִ֨ים <sup>3205 </sup> <n>which were born</n> לְךָ֜ בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto thee in the land</n> מִצְרַ֗יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>before</n> בֹּאִ֥י <sup>935 </sup> <n>I came</n> אֵלֶ֛יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <sup>4714 </sup> <n>unto thee into Egypt</n> לִי־ הֵ֑ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>are mine</n> אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> וּמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>and Manasseh</n> כִּרְאוּבֵ֥ן <sup>7205 </sup> <n>[are] mine as Reuben</n> וְשִׁמְע֖וֹן <sup>8095 </sup> <n>and Simeon</n> יִֽהְיוּ־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לִֽי׃
6: וּמוֹלַדְתְּךָ֛ <sup>4138 </sup> <n>And thy issue</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> הוֹלַ֥דְתָּ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>which thou begettest</n> אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> לְךָ֣ יִהְי֑וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עַ֣ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>after</n> שֵׁ֧ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>251 </sup> <n>of their brethren</n> יִקָּרְא֖וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>them shall be thine [and] shall be called</n> בְּנַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>in their inheritance</n>
7: וַאֲנִ֣י ׀ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> בְּבֹאִ֣י <sup>935 </sup> <n>And as for me when I came</n> מִפַּדָּ֗ן <sup>6307 </sup> <n>from Padan</n> מֵ֩תָה֩ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>died</n> עָלַ֨י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>to my sorrow</n> רָחֵ֜ל <sup>7354 </sup> <n>Rachel</n> בְּאֶ֤רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>by me in the land</n> כְּנַ֙עַן֙ <sup>3667 </sup> <n>of Canaan</n> בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in the way</n> בְּע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>when</n> כִּבְרַת־ <sup>3530 </sup> <n>yet [there was] but a little</n> אֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>way</n> לָבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>to come</n> אֶפְרָ֑תָה <sup>672 </sup> <n>unto Ephrath</n> וָאֶקְבְּרֶ֤הָ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>and I buried her</n> שָּׁם֙ <sup>8033 </sup> <n>her there</n> בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>there in the way</n> אֶפְרָ֔ת <sup>672 </sup> <n>of Ephrath</n> הִ֖וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> בֵּ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <sup>1035 </sup> <n>the same [is] Bethlehem</n>
8: וַיַּ֥רְא <sup>7200 </sup> <n>beheld</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> יוֹסֵ֑ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>Joseph's</n> וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> אֵֽלֶּה׃ <sup>428 </sup> <n>another</n>
9: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יוֹסֵף֙ <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> אָבִ֔יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto his father</n> בָּנַ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>They [are] my sons</n> הֵ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> נָֽתַן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath given</n> לִ֥י אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>whom God</n> בָּזֶ֑ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>here</n> וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>me in this [place] And he said</n> קָֽחֶם־ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Bring them</n> נָ֥א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>please</n> אֵלַ֖י <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וַאֲבָרֲכֵֽם׃ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>I pray thee unto me and I will bless</n>
10: וְעֵינֵ֤י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>Now the eyes</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כָּבְד֣וּ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>were dim</n> מִזֹּ֔קֶן <sup>2207 </sup> <n>for age</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>he</n> יוּכַ֖ל <sup>3201 </sup> <n>[so that] he could</n> לִרְא֑וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>not see</n> וַיַּגֵּ֤שׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>And he brought them near</n> אֹתָם֙ <sup>853 </sup> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק <sup>5401 </sup> <n>unto him and he kissed</n> לָהֶ֖ם וַיְחַבֵּ֥ק <sup>2263 </sup> <n>them and embraced</n> לָהֶֽם׃
11: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>unto Joseph</n> רְאֹ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>to see</n> פָנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thy face</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>never</n> פִלָּ֑לְתִּי <sup>6419 </sup> <n>I had not thought</n> וְהִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> הֶרְאָ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>hath shewed</n> אֹתִ֛י <sup>853 </sup> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>and lo God</n> גַּ֥ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>well</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זַרְעֶֽךָ׃ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>me also thy seed</n>

18: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יוֹסֵ֛ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>And Joseph</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to his</n> אָבִ֖יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>unto his father</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Not</n> כֵ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> אָבִ֑י <sup>1 </sup> <n>Not so my father</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> זֶ֣ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>this</n> הַבְּכֹ֔ר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>for this [is] the firstborn</n> שִׂ֥ים <sup>7760 </sup> <n>put</n> יְמִינְךָ֖ <sup>3225 </sup> <n>thy right hand</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon his head</n>
19: וַיְמָאֵ֣ן <sup>3985 </sup> <n>refused</n> אָבִ֗יו <sup>1 </sup> <n>And his father</n> וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> יָדַ֤עְתִּֽי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I know</n> בְנִי֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[it] my son</n> יָדַ֔עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>I know</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> ה֥וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> לְּעָ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>[it] he also shall become a people</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> ה֣וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> יִגְדָּ֑ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>and he also shall be great</n> וְאוּלָ֗ם <sup>199 </sup> <n>but truly</n> אָחִ֤יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>brother</n> הַקָּטֹן֙ <sup>6996 </sup> <n>his younger</n> יִגְדַּ֣ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>shall be greater</n> מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>than</n> וְזַרְע֖וֹ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>than he and his seed</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall become</n> מְלֹֽא־ <sup>4393 </sup> <n>shall become a multitude</n> הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of nations</n>
20: וַיְבָ֨רֲכֵ֜ם <sup>1288 </sup> <n>And he blessed</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>them that day</n> הַהוּא֮ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> לֵאמוֹר֒ <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> בְּךָ֗ יְבָרֵ֤ךְ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>bless</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>In thee shall Israel</n> לֵאמֹ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>saying</n> יְשִֽׂמְךָ֣ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>make</n> אֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> כְּאֶפְרַ֖יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>thee as Ephraim</n> וְכִמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <sup>4519 </sup> <n>and as Manasseh</n> וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>and he set</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֶפְרַ֖יִם <sup>669 </sup> <n>Ephraim</n> לִפְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <sup>4519 </sup> <n>Manasseh</n>
21: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>And Israel</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3130 </sup> <n>unto Joseph</n> הִנֵּ֥ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מֵ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>Behold I die</n> וְהָיָ֤ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אֱלֹהִים֙ <sup>430 </sup> <n>but God</n> עִמָּכֶ֔ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>you</n> וְהֵשִׁ֣יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>shall be with you and bring you again</n> אֶתְכֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>unto the land</n> אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>1 </sup> <n>of your fathers</n>
22: וַאֲנִ֞י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נָתַ֧תִּֽי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Moreover I have given</n> לְךָ֛ שְׁכֶ֥ם <sup>7926 </sup> <n>portion</n> אַחַ֖ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>to thee one</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>more</n> אַחֶ֑יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>above thy brethren</n> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>which I took</n> מִיַּ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of the hand</n> הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <sup>567 </sup> <n>of the Amorite</n> בְּחַרְבִּ֖י <sup>2719 </sup> <n>with my sword</n> וּבְקַשְׁתִּֽי׃ <sup>7198 </sup> <n>and with my bow</n> פ
